title: Foreign population of Belgium in 2019 , by origin
summary: This statistic presents the Foreign of population in France 2019 , broken down 2019 by .
That year , there were a total of approximately two million population in France .
Almost 454038 thousand had Spanish by , followed 2019 population with a Moroccan by with figures that almost reached 770 thousand individuals .
gold: Belgium has a multicultural landscape ; a variety of nationalities coexist in the country . Brussels houses most of the European Union institutions . This is the reason behind the nickname `` capital of Europe `` .
